---
id: GetSingleCurrencyAsset
title: 获取单个币种资产
sidebar_label: 获取单个币种资产
sidebar_position: 2
---

**类型：** GET

**描述：** `/spot/v4/balance`

### 参数

| 名称     | 类型   | 是否必需 | 默认值 | 描述        | 范围 |
| -------- | ------ | -------- | ------ | ----------- | ---- |
| currency | string | 是       |        | 例如：usdt  |      |

### 响应示例

```json title="响应"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "currency": "usdt",
    "currencyId": 0,
    "frozenAmount": 0,
    "availableAmount": 0,
    "totalAmount": 0,
    "convertBtcAmount": 0 // 折合BTC数量
  }
}
```
